script: frappe.listview_settings['Serial No'] = {add_fields: [ "custom_status"],get_indicator:function(doc){if (doc.custom_status === "Hold") {			return [__("Hold"), "red", "status,=,Hold"];    }if (doc.custom_status === "Delivered") {			return [__("Delivered"), "gray", "status,=,Delivered"];    }    if (doc.custom_status === "Active") {			return [__("Active"), "green", "status,=,Active"];    } }}
